p: In our study, EO alone, without the addition of the antimicrobial, have demonstrated a strong antibacterial activity against S. aureus, this result agree with the research carried out by Amri et al. ( 23). The MIC against S. aureus ATCC 29213 was 25 Î¼L/mL at pH 7.4 and it decreased 2-fold at pH 5. This result was also observed in wild strains.
